title: run function
extract: Run Functions in the EditorCreate a function in a program file named myfunction.m . ... View the commands available for running the function by clicking Run on the Editor tab. ... Replace the text type code to run with an expression that allows you to run the function. ... Run the function by clicking Run or a specific run command from the drop-down list.
extract_html:
Run Functions in the Editor
  • Create a function in a program file named myfunction.m . ...
  • View the commands available for running the function by clicking Run on the Editor tab. ...
  • Replace the text type code to run with an expression that allows you to run the function. ...
  • Run the function by clicking Run or a specific run command from the drop-down list.
